qas.question: Who do Watch Tower Society publications claim God has used?
What does God use Jehovah's Witnesses for?
What has God provided to Jehovah's Witnesses?
What have various Jehovah's Witnesses' publications made predictions about?
What had some of the failed predictions of Jehovah's Witnesses been presented as?
What Protestant religion has allowed that some of their predictions may not come to pass?
What is one of Watch Tower Society's publications?
What is one of of the Protestant religions doesn't claim to know what is coming next?
What is one of the religions that doesn't believe in an upcoming Armageddon?

context: Watch Tower Society publications have claimed that God has used <a0_0>Jehovah's Witnesses<a0_0/> (and formerly, the International Bible Students) <a1_0>to declare his will<a1_0/> and has provided <a2_0>advance knowledge about <b6_0>Armageddon<b6_0/><a2_0/> and the establishment of God's kingdom. Some publications also claimed that God has used <b5_0><b8_0>Jehovah's Witnesses<b8_0/><b5_0/> and the International Bible Students as a modern-day prophet.[note 5] <b7_0>Jehovah's Witnesses<b7_0/>' publications have made various predictions about <a3_0>world events<a3_0/> they believe were prophesied in the Bible. Failed predictions have led to the alteration or abandonment of some doctrines. Some failed predictions had been presented as <a4_0>"beyond doubt"<a4_0/> or "approved by God".
